body.p: Information about the 2006.1 release of Gentoo Linux, GCC 4.1.1 and glibc 2.4 upgrades for AMD64 and x86, and coverage of the German Gentoo Summer Camp and more in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Also in this issue, planet.gentoo.org coverage, Gentoo-running robots, and the usual bugs and security reports.
